column5: Perhaps it has been posted before but for those who can use it, here is a site on everything you ever wanted to know about batteries. Storage, sulfation, charging etc.  http://www.uuhome.de/william.darden/carfaq.htm  FT
Cool site Tech!  The info is very detailed.  I'll check the site again once my boat is back from the mechanic as I'll have to pull the battery out.
Nice to see they debunk the battery on concrete myth!  I am still amazed at how many people still believe in this myth.

very interesting,thanks  FT,thats really helpfull,and there is info that alot of people prob,dont know,i always thought that you could not store a battery on a cement floor,well its nice to know that now........
